name: Saint's Spinefield
content:
Saint's Spinefield

A martyred body's vertebrae arches from the ground like a cathedral. Primary Objectives are bone-altars. Secondary are nerve-beacons or organ shrines. Even the wind sounds like whispering prayers.


Terrain Features:

  • Bone altars
  • Nerve beacons
  • Organ shrines
  • Vertebrae arches

Atmosphere:

The air is filled with the sound of whispered prayers and the creaking of ancient bones. The ground is littered with fragments of holy relics and the remains of past pilgrims.
